description: A specialised fluid sac which is installed in the roof of the user's mouth, capable of emitting various chemicals in a targeted cone.
Large exterior venting systems allow the user to disperse large amounts of gas into the surrounding atmosphere continuously.
A series of storage tanks connect to a 'Variable Chemical Factory' unit, capable of manufacturing a limited amount of chemicals by taking resources from a host's body.
A module containing various neural drones that are implanted in the user's brain, greatly improving their cognitive abilities at the cost of increasing their metabolism.
